channel.title: Chocolate Rain Techno
channel.description:
Yeah don't get too overworked yet. Me and my best friend have spent some time on this, recording the keyboard parts and mastering it and whatnot. I don't think it's much like the original besides the necessities, like the piano parts.
I'm pretty sure it's a done project for now. Except we mighttt record some vocals ourselves and add those in, but that's a slim chance.
So here it is.
http://somethingtohide.heliohost.org/images/chocolaterain.mp3

item.title: Chocolate Rain Techno
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:8, topic:215287”]Was this what you were going for? I also posted a topic second page.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9-tHAwsPkHo&NR=1[/quote]

Lol that is completely different. His song is techno and that is not. All you had to do was read the title and you could tell they were different.

Read full topic

did you even listen to my song?

They are two completely different things.

item.title: Chocolate Rain Techno
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

Sounds good but in the middle of the song, the techno stops and when he says “Chocolate rain” it sounds terrible.

It opens in quicktime in my browser for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Chocolate Rain Techno
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Listened to it in the car and it was terribleee quality for that.

So I remastered it and got around to changing a few more things. They shouldn’t overpower each other now. I’m almost at that perfect mix between them.

Click the link again.

Read full topic

item.title: Chocolate Rain Techno
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:3, topic:215287”]I know, I noticed that, but it’s only when I export it. I changed the EQs around to minimize it. I was thinking it’s just these shitty speakers trying to produce all the frequencies because that’s what my old car speakers were doing, but I bought new ones and crossed over everything and that doesn’t happen anymore.

I don’t know if I should up the quality of the mp3 or what. But it’s pretty much on par with CD quality right now.[/quote]
Actually feel free to disregard what I just said because I gotta say the speakers and sound card on this computer are very very crap. They crackle nearly all the time lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Chocolate Rain Techno
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Ahh not this song again! Hahah

Read full topic

item.title: Chocolate Rain Techno
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

You mean like make a video for it and upload it or what?

I know, I noticed that, but it’s only when I export it. I changed the EQs around to minimize it. I was thinking it’s just these shitty speakers trying to produce all the frequencies because that’s what my old car speakers were doing, but I bought new ones and crossed over everything and that doesn’t happen anymore.

I don’t know if I should up the quality of the mp3 or what. But it’s pretty much on par with CD quality right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Chocolate Rain Techno
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Dude upload it to youtube, I was downloading at 20kb/s which sucks.

It was pretty good, at some points though it sounded like the drums/pads were drowning out the rest of the music when ever they were hit so that’s one thing that wasn’t good.

Anyway yeah upload to youtube.

Read full topic
